question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off towards the trees and them make a left. flat towards the tree on the corner and land. fly over the buildings and bear left. follow the path to the tall building on height then turn right. fly upwards over the billboard. fly over the first tall building then to the next and go left around it. make a left and fly back past the tall buildings on your left. make a right and go downwards to the building on the corner by the water. when over the building turn right towards the water. turn left and follow the path in front of the building next to the water.]. You move according to a series of movement instructions. What is the Landmark Position between you and the tall building on the corner by the water when you reach your current location?  
choose:  
A. I am located on the left side of the tall building at the corner by the water.  
B. I am located on the right side of the tall building at the corner of the waterside.  
C. I stay away from the high-rise buildings at the waterside corner.  
D. I am located above the high-rise building at the corner of the waterside.  
E. I am located under the high building at the corner of the waterside.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The sequence of images and the navigation instructions indicate that the agent has moved towards the tall building on the corner by the water and is now positioned to its right side, as it follows the path next to the water. This aligns with option B, which states that the agent is on the right side of the tall building at the corner of the waterside.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 60)]
Option: B
Reason: From the beginning of the video until around 0:60, the agent is moving towards the tall building on the corner by the water. After that, the agent turns right towards the water, placing the tall building on the corner to the agent's left. Therefore, the agent is located on the right side of the tall building at the corner of the waterside.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The sequence of images and the navigation instructions indicate that the agent has moved towards the tall building on the corner by the water and is now positioned to its right side, as it follows the path next to the water. This aligns with option B, which states that the agent is on the right side of the tall building at the corner of the waterside.
